argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islssfg.x | |- X = ( W |`s U ) |
| 2 |  | islssfg.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | islssfg.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_lssss | |- ( U e. S -> U C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4 | #P_ressbas2 | |- ( U C_ ( Base ` W ) -> U = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( U e. S -> U = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_pweqd | |- ( U e. S -> ~P U = ~P ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rexeqdv | |- ( U e. S -> ( E. b e. ~P U ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) <-> E. b e. ~P ( Base ` X ) ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> ( E. b e. ~P U ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) <-> E. b e. ~P ( Base ` X ) ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_elpwi | |- ( b e. ~P U -> b C_ U ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSpan ` X ) = ( LSpan ` X ) |
| 13 | 1, 3, 12, 2 | #P_lsslsp | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S /\ b C_ U ) -> ( N ` b ) = ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ b C_ U ) -> ( N ` b ) = ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ b e. ~P U ) -> ( N ` b ) = ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) ) |
| 16 | 7 | #P_ad2antlr | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ b e. ~P U ) -> U = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ b e. ~P U ) -> ( ( N ` b ) = U <-> ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) /\ b e. ~P U ) -> ( ( b e. Fin /\ ( N ` b ) = U ) <-> ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rexbidva | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> ( E. b e. ~P U ( b e. Fin /\ ( N ` b ) = U ) <-> E. b e. ~P U ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 1, 2 | #P_lsslmod | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> X e. LMod ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` X ) = ( Base ` X ) |
| 22 | 21, 12 | #P_islmodfg | |- ( X e. LMod -> ( X e. LFinGen <-> E. b e. ~P ( Base ` X ) ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 23 | 20, 22 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. LFinGen <-> E. b e. ~P ( Base ` X ) ( b e. Fin /\ ( ( LSpan ` X ) ` b ) = ( Base ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 10, 19, 23 | #P_3bitr4rd | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. LFinGen <-> E. b e. ~P U ( b e. Fin /\ ( N ` b ) = U ) ) ) |
